featured.title: AI Resume Screener
featured.description: Built an AI system using NLP and transformer models to automate resume screening and candidate evaluation for hiring managers.

featured.description: Created a medical chatbot using Retrieval-Augmented Generation to provide accurate, context-aware responses to patient queries.
